remarks: Axiom of Quantifier Introduction (intuitionistic logic axiom ax-i12).  In classical logic, this is mostly a restatement of ~ axc9 (with one additional quantifier).  But in intuitionistic logic, changing the negations and implications to disjunctions makes it stronger. (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 31-Dec-2017.)
statement: axi12 $p |- ( A. z z = x \/ ( A. z z = y \/ A. z ( x = y -> A. z x = y ) ) ) $.
